thumb.title: 歴史秘話 高台の聖域 久が原東部八幡神社
thumb.description: 久が原東部八幡神社 東京都大田区久が原２丁目１８−４出典 FSA A1999.35 230 Tokyo View from Atago Hill.Smithsonian Institution https://sova.si.edu/record/fsa.a1999.35/ref330?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=444&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=452 Group of Women in Costume by Torii (Gateway) and Blossoming Cherry Trees at Noge Hill.Smithsonian Institution https://sova.si.edu/record/naa.photolot.97/ref7858?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=1728&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=1738 View of Yokohama from French Hill.1863–1868.Felice Beato.The Getty Museum https://www.getty.edu/art/collection/object/109BCH Nagasaki, Japan Temple Street, with the cemetery on the hillside in the background. Photograph by Felice Beato, ca. 1868. https://wellcomecollection.org/works/xfgr8huk/images?id=ps3pujtr BGM All_the_Love byのる ナレーションは音読さん
